title: Science Inquiry Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Narrative Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of foundational scientific concepts and problem-solving abilities for everyday life
context.additional_context: Encouraging participation through smartphone-based resource access and small-group discussions

learning_goals: Learners can analyze scientific problem situations through narrative structures and extract core elements with 80% accuracy.
Learners can complete assignments that restructure scientific experiment results into creative stories using storytelling techniques at a 100% success rate.
Learners achieve at least 75% proficiency in formative assessments by writing narrative-based science reports incorporating peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
